LanguageData.MSTranscendence_Vial.label: Transcendence Vial
LanguageData.MSTranscendence_Vial.description: Vial of Transcendence chemicals. To be prepared in the Stimlab.
LanguageData.MSTranscendence_Receptive.label: Transcendence (Receptive)
LanguageData.MSTranscendence_Receptive.description: A dose of self injected mechanites designed to boost capabilities of a specific quality. Receptive can boost Animal and Social skills.
LanguageData.MSTranscendence_Inventive.label: Transcendence (Inventive)
LanguageData.MSTranscendence_Inventive.description: A dose of self injected mechanites designed to boost capabilities of a specific quality. Inventive can boost Artistic, Cooking and Plant skills.
LanguageData.MSTranscendence_Tactical.label: Transcendence (Tactical)
LanguageData.MSTranscendence_Tactical.description: A dose of self injected mechanites designed to boost capabilities of a specific quality. Tactical can boost Shooting and Melee skills.
LanguageData.MSTranscendence_Practical.label: Transcendence (Practical)
LanguageData.MSTranscendence_Practical.description: A dose of self injected mechanites designed to boost capabilities of a specific quality. Practical can boost Construction, Crating and Mining skills.
LanguageData.MSTranscendence_Analytical.label: Transcendence (Analytical)
LanguageData.MSTranscendence_Analytical.description: A dose of self injected mechanites designed to boost capabilities of a specific quality. Analytical can boost Intellectual and Medicine skills.
